title: Crayola's original font
content:
can anyone tell me what crayolas original font was?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111231070430im_/http:/typophile.com/files/crayola-1_3445.jpg)
author: lindseytrella

comments.content: its not futura :( thanks, any other suggestions?
[Futura Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20111231070430/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/futura/bold/) with modified height of y and l.
Sure it’s not exactly Futura, but that’s probably as close as you’ll get. It’s a logo after all, so there could be some tweaking involved if it’s not custom-made in the first place.

That's not the original font, FYI:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111231070430im_/http:/typophile.com/files/crayola_5115.jpg)
